programs.title: Toddler Program (18-36 months)
programs.description: A nurturing environment where toddlers develop social skills and independence through play-based learning.

programs.title: Preschool Program (3-4 years)
programs.description: An engaging curriculum that prepares children for school through structured play and learning activities.

programs.title: Pre-K Program (4-5 years)
programs.description: Advanced preparation for kindergarten with focus on academic and social readiness.
